segments.text: Hi , this is Monica . I was wondering when we can work on this financial report .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Today , I am busy all day long .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Shall I see you on Friday morning ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That ’ s not good for me at all . It ’ ll have to be another time .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: We must find some time to read report .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I know . I am available from 1 PM to 4 PM on Friday afternoon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s all right . Then see you on Friday afternoon .
segments.speaker: S2
